sentences.en: China is a land of scenic contrasts , each uniquely representing its own area.
sentences.cn: 祖国山水,风格多样;多样的风格, 相对应而存在,相比较而多姿.

sentences.en: Heavy traffic will spoil the scenic route.
sentences.cn: 拥挤的交通会损坏优美的道路.

sentences.en: I went some miles out of my way to take the scenic road into Macon.
sentences.cn: 我绕行了几英里，想要经由那条风景秀丽的公路进入梅肯。

sentences.en: Its bare - stage style of presentation anticipated the scenic austerity of later years.
sentences.cn: 它的不带布景的舞台表演风格为后来布景上的朴素化开了先河.

sentences.en: Just fancy that I have neglected to visit even Tao Ran Ting , a local scenic attraction!
sentences.cn: 以名胜说,我没到过陶然亭, 这多可笑!

sentences.en: Let's take the scenic route, along the coast.
sentences.cn: 我们顺着沿海这条风景优美的路走 吧.

sentences.en: She took pleasure in reciting the list of scenic spots around the town.
sentences.cn: 她很乐意地历数该镇周围的风景点.

sentences.en: The city is famed for its scenic spots.

sentences.cn: 地势变得更开阔、更平整，风景十分优美。

sentences.en: The production of the musical comedy was a scenic triumph.
sentences.cn: 该音乐喜剧的制作是戏剧上的一大成功.

sentences.en: The scenic beauty of the place entranced [ fascinated ] the visitors.
sentences.cn: 这里的美丽风光把游客们 迷住 了.

sentences.en: The scenic flight plane flies over the West Lake.
sentences.cn: 那游览飞机在西湖的上空飞行.

sentences.en: The scenic spot is on northwestern outskirts of Beijing.
sentences.cn: 这个风景区位于北京的西北远郊.

sentences.en: Thirty - two bridges cross this scenic river.
This is an extremely scenic part of America.
sentences.cn: 这是美国风景极其优美的一个地区。
